_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_HAIRYHOUSE_B1

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: August 02 2016

Here is the Navigation Mesh for the unique and fun map de_hairyhouse_b1 by NIPPER (released September 2007). It's a completely hand-made and carefully optimized .nav-file (in original author's release the .nav-file was slightly edited and not fully playable auto-gen).

This Navigation Mesh was created from scratch approximately for 80%. But the special attention has been paid to some hard-passable areas - oar doors, air ducts and rope ladders.

Also this Navigation Mesh was fully Place Painted.

Well... the bots freely move through all areas of the map now. Though these dirty bastards visit a bathroom very reluctantly :D

Play and Enjoy! Also don't forget to write your responses ;-)

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by map creator included in original archive and available to downloading with the same map.

Credits and Gratitudes:  NIPPER (for fine mansion-themed map for close combats).

Additional Gratitudes:  BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),  Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),  CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),  Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

There is no boredom in this house! :-)
